name: CourageWorth
description:
What is CourageWorth?

Courage Worth is a 2.5D platformer which focuses on story, progressive gameplay, and diverse combat mechanics.

Story:

The protagonist, Luke, is a resident of Guardania - a village that protects the legendary six gemstones that keep the world in unison, and its residents living in harmony. That is, until one day, the enemy species known as the Nilbog race stole the gemstones and retreated into their hideout, deep within the land's cave. The player must now embark on a journey to reach the enemy hideout and retrieve the six gemstones!

Progressive Gameplay:

After leaving Luke's hometown, he will traverse distinct environments from the open overworld to the cave where the atmosphere becomes more rigid, and the fear of the unknown becomes more apparent. Some levels vary in structure, offering more verticality and awareness of surroundings to reach the end!

Diverse Combat Mechanics

Luke can obtain a variety of different spells with their own distinct power harnessed from the stolen gemstones. These have a wide range of uses such as traveling along the ground to piercing shots and can even deal effective or ineffective damage depending on the enemies you encounter.
